page.title: 17WESTRIDGE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: {Westridge Leisure Centre}has a wide variety of activities that appeal to young and old alike. The{car park} outside is free. There is a {safari {golf course}which costs 25p for children and 50p for adults. There is an{outside swimming pool}with a slide. Inside is a large{heated pool}and a{ {smaller learner pool.}There are ample facilities for the disabled. Within the complex are eight{squash {courts,}a{games room}a{badminton {court.}Many other activities are held in these areas, including{karate}and{ {aerobics.}The Centre is open every day of the year except{Christmas Day.}
